TopicTitle: How can I move crew out of a PPD-10 Hitchhiker Storage Container?

Articles.Content: I have a space station with a PPD-10 Hitchhiker Storage Container and a Mobile Processing Lab MPL-LG-2. I accidentally launched it with the crew in the storage container. How can I move them to the lab? I can rt-click the can and get a Crew Report but there are no portraits and there doesn't seem to be a way to access the crew in there.
Click on the lab's hatch. You should be able to access the crew from there.

> 
> Click on the lab's hatch. You should be able to access the crew from there.

If that fails, the mod, crew manifest, is a sure-fire way to get access to them.

You have to left-click on the can's hatch (which can sometimes be difficult to find the right spot). That will bring up the menu to "transfer" them into the lab.

Cheers,

~Claw

Try the Ship Manifest mod:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62270-0-90-0-Ship-Manifest-%28Crew-Science-Resources%29-v0-90-0_3-3-3-19-Dec-14](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62270-0-90-0-Ship-Manifest-%28Crew-Science-Resources%29-v0-90-0_3-3-3-19-Dec-14)

R-clicking on the crew hatch can be a bit dicey at times with stock.
